title: Dimension Mappings
description: Provides mappings for mapping one dimension to another or removing a dimension.

OVERWORLD.title: Set the output for the overworld
OVERWORLD.description: Set what dimension the overworld should be converted to. If this field is not present, the dimension won't be written.

NETHER.title: Set the output for the nether
NETHER.description: Set what dimension the nether should be converted to. If this field is not present, the dimension won't be written.

THE_END.title: Set the output for the the end
THE_END.description: Set what dimension the end should be converted to. If this field is not present, the dimension won't be written.
